description_txt: stated on August 13, 2016 in an interview with TV station WJAC:
quote_txt: "NAFTA, signed by Bill Clinton, has been a disaster for Pennsylvania."

description_txt: stated on August 16, 2016 in in a press release:
quote_txt: "While introducing Donald Trump, former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani omitted the September 11, 2001, strikes as a ‘successful’ terrorist attack during the eight years before President Obama’s 2008 election."

description_txt: stated on August 8, 2016 in a press release :
quote_txt: "Gonzales’ losing campaign against me last spring was funded with more than $1 million from supporters and allies of Governor Bruce Rauner."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2016 in a speech in Scranton, Pa.:
quote_txt: Says military commanders have said that if Donald Trump were elected, "they would not follow his orders."

description_txt: stated on August 17, 2016 in a campaign rally in Cleveland:
quote_txt: "I am the only candidate who ran in either the Democratic or the Republican primary who said from the very beginning (that) I will not raise taxes on the middle class."

description_txt: stated on August 10, 2016 in a tweet about Carol Everett of the Heidi Group:
quote_txt: Says the director of an anti-abortion group receiving a Texas grant to provide women’s health services "believes HIV can be spread through the sewer system."

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2016 in comments at Texas Democratic Party convention:
quote_txt: "Today California is kicking our butt, creating more jobs and more economic growth than Texas."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2016 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says "Marco Rubio wrote and passed bipartisan legislation allowing the VA to fire negligent workers."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2016 in a campaign speech in Scranton, Pa. :
quote_txt: Says her campaign platform includes the "biggest investment in new, good-paying jobs since World War II."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2016 in an interview with the Texas Tribune:
quote_txt: "Seventy percent of all Texans are overweight or obese."

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2016 in a Medium post:
quote_txt: "Most Americans support" the legalization of marijuana.

description_txt: stated on August 11, 2016 in a campaign mailer:
quote_txt: On the Iran nuclear deal

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2016 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump "has a long history of exporting jobs overseas."

description_txt: stated on July 7, 2016 in a press release.:
quote_txt: Kim Myers "voted repeatedly to raise taxes on the people of Broome County, but made millions off of tax savings when her family business relocated its headquarters."

description_txt: stated on August 14, 2016 in an interview on "State of the Union":
quote_txt: Says there was a "NATO base in Turkey being under attack by terrorists."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2016 in a speech in Youngstown, Ohio:
quote_txt: "Under those eight years before (Barack) Obama came along, we didn’t have any successful radical Islamic terrorist attack in the United States" since Sept. 11, 2001.

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2016 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Roy Cooper's refusal to do his job is costing taxpayers money."

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2016 in a pamphlet mailed to voters:
quote_txt: "Because there's no local option to allow communities to ban, limit or restrict the location of pot shops, if Amendment 2 passes you can expect the seedy elements of the pot industry to move in right next door to your neighborhood, your church, your business and even your child's school."

description_txt: stated on August 3, 2016 in a town hall meeting:
quote_txt: Legal prescription drugs "statistically kill 100,000 people a year, (but) there are no documented deaths due to marijuana."

description_txt: stated on August 4, 2016 in a rally:
quote_txt: The Obama administration has been "raising taxes."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2016 in a speech on foreign policy in Youngstown, Ohio:
quote_txt: "I had previously said that NATO was obsolete because it failed to deal adequately with terrorism. Since my comments, they have changed their policy and now have a new division focused on terror threats."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2016 in viral image circulating on the internet:
quote_txt: Says there were multiple instances of voter fraud in Wood County, Ohio.
